===AI Logic===
{{See also|Cooldown#Enemy Cooldowns}}
* An ability will only be used if all of the following conditions have been met:
** The ability is not on cooldown
** The target is within the range required by the ability
** The ability has the highest priority out of all that meet the previous 2 conditions
*** A lower priority number indicates a higher priority.
*** If multiple abilities share the highest priority, one will be chosen at random.
* Certain abilities with extra trigger conditions may defy regular ability logic.

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A soldier encased within a Fatui war machine.<br />Armed with equipment that can control the elements to a certain extent, their guns are capable of firing jets of water.<br />These skirmishers do not question if they shall live or die as they advance into nations far from home to complete {{Sic|reconaissance}} missions and lay the groundwork for operations to come.|[[Archive]]}}
